about_the_game:
Continuing in the successful line of Windowskins and User Interface Material is Vol 4 from Gee Kun Soft with more customized looks for your game! This next pack in the series features even more variety of UI (User Interface) material to bring more original flair to your game!

This pack offers User Interface material such as system windowskins with a variety of designs, beautifully designed screen frames which are perfect for game opening screens, and bonus content to give you more graphic treats and variety.

Step out of the ordinary and explore more possibilities with this new series of User Interface Material!

FEATURES:

* 40 system windowskins: 10 designs x 4 patterns ("system" folder)
* 40 frames for opening screen etc: 10 designs x 4 patterns ("titles 2" folder)
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Bonus material:
① - 120 user interface icons for message windows etc.
② - 8 character faces / 8 full body images
**Please note that you require editing tools or plugins to use Bonus icons
